title: How Barrett Extension Impacts Mitchell Talks, Potential For Kings
description:
Brian Windhorst is joined by ESPN's Tim MacMahon and Tim Bontemps to discuss how RJ Barrett’s extension with the Knicks impacts Donovan Mitchell trade talks, if it is a good contract for New York and talk what is going on in Sacramento including if playoff expectations are legitimate for the Kings. Plus, the guys talk the results of the Offseason NBA Survey article done by Bontemps.
